content: It's a place where my dad used to take me when I was a kid, a small lake town a few hours away from where I live. We'd spend hours fishing and just enjoying quality time together. I think going back there will help me process my emotions and remember the good times with him, especially since the 10-year anniversary of his passing is coming up soon. As for activities, I'm open to suggestions, but I think just being in that environment and taking things slow will be helpful. I have about a week for the trip, and my budget is relatively flexible.
